testimonials.name: Sarah T.
testimonials.text: Sagasystem made the switch to solar so easy! My bills are lower and I feel great about helping the planet.

testimonials.name: Mike R.
testimonials.text: The installation was quick and professional. Highly recommend Sagasystem for anyone considering solar.

faq.question: How much can I save with solar?
faq.answer: Savings depend on your location and energy usage, but most homeowners see significant reductions in their electricity bills.

faq.question: Is my home a good fit for solar?
faq.answer: Our team will assess your roof and energy needs to determine if solar is right for you.

faq.question: What incentives are available?
faq.answer: Federal and local incentives may be available to help lower your installation costs.
